revised_title: Steroidal Contraceptives: Manufacturing, Distribution, and Future Prospects
tldr: This article discusses the manufacturing and distribution of steroidal contraceptives, focusing on the technical and political aspects. It explores the challenges and future prospects of the contraceptive industry, including the rise of total synthesis and microbial transformations in the production process. The author predicts that currently employed contraceptives will remain the main options for the foreseeable future, with minor variations in dosage or formulation.
